comments:
Description:
NPE when insert a table group in Outline then undo it

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a table
2. Select Groups in Outline, right click, click Insert Insert Group.
3. Undo it.

Expected result:
Insert group action is undone.

Actual result:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredSelection.equals(StructuredSelection.java:111)

This bug exists in build 20060320 but not in 20060321, so cancel it.
